a.alcapa: anomalous left coronary artery from pulmonary artery

c.cms: centers for medicare and medicaid services

d.dlco: diffusing capacity of the lung for carbon monoxide

h.heent: head, ears, eyes, nose, and throat
h.hipaa: health insurance portability and accountability act
h.hnscc: head and neck squamous cell carcinoma

i.idhl: immediately dangerous to health or life

j.jcaho: joint commission on accreditation of healthcare organizations

k.kco: diffusion capacity of the lung for carbon monoxide per liter alveolar volume

n.nihss: national institutes of health stroke scale

p.paco2: partial pressure of carbon dioxide in arterial blood
p.pao2: partial pressure of oxygen in arterial blood
p.pearl: pupils equal and reactive to light

s.spgr: spoiled gradient recalled acquisition in the steady state

t.tahs: total abdominal hysterectomy with bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy
t.trip: total reconstruction of the inferior pole
